alert.note: Alert for Shiawassee (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 2:21PM EDT until July 20 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM EDT FOR SOUTHERN SHIAWASSEE COUNTY... At 221 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Laingsburg, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Morrice around 225 PM EDT. Bancroft around 235 PM EDT. Durand and Byron around 240 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Bennington, Shaftsburg and Vernon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
